Want to support Black-owned businesses but don't know where to begin?

Redirect suggests Black-owned alternatives to the products on Amazon that you know and love.

Redirect your money away from big business and discover your new favorite Black-owned brands.

Coming soon to the Chrome store.

How It Works

Open the Redirect extension when shopping on Amazon and search for your favorite products.

Redirect will recommend Black-owned businesses that sell products in the same category.

Click "Visit Site" to shop from a Black-owned alternative and Redirect your shopping money!

Our $tory

Redirect went from an idea to a working prototype in just 11 days. After attending a virtual watch party and discussion of the documentary 13th, our founder was inspired to create a Chrom extension to help shoppers vote with their wallets by supporting Black-owned businesses. She began to research the idea.

Just one week later, she pitched the idea at the NYC Coders Hack for Black Lives Hackathon despite not being able to code herself. Four incredibly talented developers joined her to form Team Redirect, and in less than four days, the team built a working prototype, which was selected as on of the four winning products out of 25 participating teams.

Today, the team has grown to over 10 people, and we are working toward launching our extension to the Chrom store. Want to receive updates about our progress or share a Black-owned business with us? Please get in touch!

Join the Movement!

Join our mailing list to receive periodic updates about the progress of the project. We will never spam you or solicit your email address, ever. You'll be the first to know when we launch!

We want to increase the reach of Black-owned businesses and connect then with new customers. If you have a business you'd like to recommend, please let use know!
